txt.en: 'While searching for the goblin, you should reduce the number of Orcs residing in their accursed village. They are bound to continue hunting us otherwise, delaying our mission.'
Faeron can be found at Viznak's Hideout.\n\nYou should talk to Faeron.

'Good work as usual, [placeholder]. I'm still perplexed by the behaviour of these Orcs. Who is inspiring such worship and sacrifice? Does the disease evoke this strange reaction only in Orcs and trolls, or will Rhadrog lose his wits as well if we don't cure him with haste? This is all quite puzzling....'
Infected Orcs can be found in Faltor Gâm, in central Agarnaith.\n\nYou should defeat Orcs in Faltor Gâm.
While you are storming Faltor Gâm to rescue Viznak, it would be wise to clear out some of the infected Orcs who reside there.
